thread.title: Kids on American Football: 'I wanted to try something new'
thread.title_full: Kids on American Football: 'I wanted to try something new'

title: Kids on American Football: 'I wanted to try something new'
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Kids on American Football: 'I wanted to try something new' 5 February 2017 Last updated at 11:46 GMT It might be the most popular sport in the USA but American football is still a new kid on the block here in the UK. 
But that's changing and more and more people in Britain are starting take up the sport. 
It's different, it's fun, it's exciting and it can be a little bit muddy according to some of the kids who have taken it up. 
Have a watch of this video to hear why they're enjoying it so much. Read more
